name: ChiefChicken & The Believer
description:
Recently, at the Kingdom Farm Chicken, a cat surveillance company named "Paw Control" was able to outbid the "Big Bone Watch" dog company that used to be operating so far...

Since the Paw took over control of the Farm surveillance, the Chicken Society started noticing several mysterious disapperances.

Worry no more, ChiefChicken has a plan to get himself and his fellows out out of here !

Play solo or in local cooperation to control Chief and The Believer to distract the cats in your way to escape from the enclosures.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Made with Unreal Engine 5.0.3

Controls:

Gamepad

Left Joystick - Move ChiefChicken

Right Joystick - Move The Believer

Left Trigger - Cock-A-Doodle-Doo with ChiefChicken

Right Trigger - Cock-A-Doodle-Doo with The Believer

KBM

WQSD - Move ChiefChicken

Arrows - Move The Believer

F - Cock-A-Doodle-Doo with ChiefChicken

G - Cock-A-Doodle-Doo with The Believer

Team

Tiezzi - Programming all game logic & AI

Styloo - 3D Models & Animation

SleepyUFO - Musics, SFX

RML - Game Design & Creative Direction

Used Assets :

PNG Images, SFX - Pixabay

Fonts - 1001FreeFonts
